website_summaries.verdict: Although similar to its competitor, the Shop Fox W1685, this product trumps its competitor in terms of suction and build quality.
pros: Able to capture 74 percent of all one-micron particles
Compacts waste for less-frequent bag changes

customer_reviews.title: It works well and my husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: He does a lot of wood working in his shop. Since I bought him the vacuum, the shop is always free from sawdust. No more dusty shoes or sawdust on the kitchen floor or on his loathing, hair etc.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Miller

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about this dust  collector.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old Delta system. I am very satisfied with the Jet dust collector. The design is very similar to the old Delta collector which had been working well for thr past 20 years until the motor gave out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Looked at several reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Some set up difficulties following directions. Need to purchase a number of adapters after the fact. It takes up alot of room in workshop. Need to wear earphones, noisy
customer_reviews.author: A. Christine Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I selected this dust collector based on it's technical specs and reviews. It picks up sawdust from my router, band saw and radial arm saw with little spillage. When running it is a bit noisy but not annoying. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Nice design.  Great suction.  5 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. Great suction. 5 year warranty is good too. Made my own bracket out of aluminum and A/C duct. See pic. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wow Great Quality and Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised by the quality after buying a cheaper dust collector and having to return. The motor itself is about 100lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum because it has the p0wer it takes to keep my shop clean.
customer_reviews.author: norwegiankid

customer_reviews.title: Great Dust Collector
customer_reviews.text: Powerful enough for the woodworking I do. Easy setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Jet Dc-1100VX-5M
customer_reviews.text: It leaves an absolute minimum of dust behind when using drum sander. To me that is the gold standard of dust collection.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bozman

customer_reviews.title: The assembly instructions were strait forward and the unit was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this dust collector twice and I'm impress with it. It is a lot quieter than my old craftsman vacuum cleaner. The assembly instructions were strait forward and the unit was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great machine! Does great with my 15 inch planer
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! Does great with my 15 inch planer! Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Helderman

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the dust collector.
customer_reviews.text: Makes clean up at the end of the day very minimal! Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bittle

customer_reviews.title: with pic
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine for my small shop. Exceeds my expectations for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: John Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, frame is a little flimsy, doesn't seem to affect performance.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler T Winger

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Still early in use, but the product came as specified. Easy assembly. Great suction. Hope to get a lot of work out of it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: I did lots of research and this dust collector met my requirements for the price. I have a small wood shop in my garage and this machine has made keeping my garage clean much easier. It was easy to assemble and was ready for use within a half hour. It is much quieter than my shop vac and with the large collection bag rarely do I have to empty it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barker

customer_reviews.title: and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Just picked one up today. Assembly was quick, intuitive, and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Neymeyer

product_meta.title: Jet DC-1100VX-5M Dust Collector 1.5HP, 1PH 115/230-Volt 5-Micron Bag Filter Kit
product_meta.description:
Style:5-Micron Bag Filter KitWe see a future built on great brands, great products and great people. In every facet of our business we leverage the strengths of our global infrastructure to maximize the benefits of all three.

AMAZON.COM
JET’s DC-1100VX-5M dust collector features Vortex Cone technology, which improves chip separation to prevent clogging of the filter and increases packing efficiency of the collector bag. With a collection capacity of 5.3 cubic feet and a 1.5-horsepower motor, the DC-1100VX-5M provides a combination of size, accessibility, and power that makes it both productive and easy to use.



DC-1100VX-5M
Dust Collector
At a Glance: * Eliminates rapid performance drop due to premature filter clogging 
 * Captures 98% of 5-micron particles and 74% of 1-micron particles
 * Dual 4-inch dust port allows for simultaneous connection of two machines
 * Sound rating of 70 to 80 decibels




JET’s DC-1100VX-5M dust collector offers superior particle collection thanks to its exclusive Vortex Cone technology. View largerConvenience and Common Sense
Many of the design features of the DC-1100VX-5M allow for straightforward and expedient use. The totally enclosed, fan-cooled, 1.5-horsepower motor is rated for continuous duty with plentiful horsepower for efficient air movement, while the precision-balanced, all-steel impeller maximizes air intake. The see-through dust bag helps prevent premature bag change-outs, and the sewn-in snap ring makes for rapid insertion and removal. Plus, four heavy-duty casters make for easy mobility around the workshop.
Benefits Behind the Technology
First and foremost, the Vortex Cone technology eliminates filter clogging, which in turn improves ease of use, strengthens performance quality, and extends the lifespan of the machine. It dramatically advances chip-separation efficiency in single-stage dust collectors, and it aids quick fallout of chips into the collector bag. Fewer bag changes are required because of the reduction in violent airflows that increases packing effectiveness.

What's in the Box
One JET DC-1100VX-5M dust collector, 1.5HP 1PH 115/230-volt, 5-micron bag filter kit.



JET’s Vortex Cone technology makes a visible difference to chip separation and filter efficiency. (Click each to enlarge)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Jet DC-1100VX-5M features the exclusive Vortex Cone, which improves chip separation to prevent clogging of the filter, and increases packing efficiency of the collector bag. The filter bag captures up to 98 percent of 5-micron particles. The high air velocity (CFM) stands up to any competitive specifications, and the industrial controls are designed for years of durable use. Collection bags have a snap ring for fast installation and removal. Casters offer maneuverability within the shop.

See more
feature_bullets: Vortex cone improves chip separation and collector bag packing efficiency
Eliminates premature filter clogging for sustained performance
Single stage design for economical and quiet operation
Industrial controls designed for years of trouble free use
Quick connects collection bags with elastic band for fast, easy installation and removal

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
